conversation.message: Dear School_E admissions team, I’m Student_A and School_E is my first choice. I’m very excited about the opportunity to join and would enthusiastically accept an offer if admitted. Thank you for considering my application.

If rejected, I can pivot next round to my strong backup (School_B) where I am ranked 1st.
